CustomField.description: Customize your Sentiment Insight Analysis preferences by selecting the types of insights you want SurveyVista to analyze from your survey responses. Choose from the following options: Key Phrases: Enable to identify significant phrases within survey responses, such as key topics, themes, or subjects. Sentiment: Enable to analyze the overall sentiment expressed in survey responses, categorizing them as positive, neutral, negative, or mixed. Targeted Sentiment: Enable to evaluate sentiment associated with specific entities mentioned in survey responses, providing insights into how respondents feel about particular topics or entities.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Customize your Sentiment Insight Analysis preferences by selecting the types of insights you want SurveyVista to analyze from your survey responses.
CustomField.label: Sentiment Insights Preferences
